The NSC-R Tidy Tuesday workshop sessions are inspired by the [Tidy Tuesday](https://www.tidytuesday.com/) initiative, which is aimed at providing a safe and supportive forum for individuals to practice their data processing and visualization skills in R while working with real-world data.

This workshop (January 9, 2024, 13:00-14:00) will be led by a member of the NSC-R Workshops team.
Please join us on January 9, 2024 at 13:00 CET on Zoom by clicking [here](https://us02web.zoom.us/j/4539912989)  using password *NSCR*.


### Materials

Materials will be posted here as soon as they are available.
